text: Admiral Ushakov () is a 1953 Soviet war movie directed by Mikhail Romm.Морской медведь: адмирал Ушаков и его победыАдмирал Ушаков (1953) The movie portrays the career of Feodor Ushakov, a celebrated naval officer and contemporary of Horatio Nelson. It stars Ivan Pereverzev, Boris Livanov, and Sergei Bondarchuk. ==Actors== * Ivan Pereverzev as Adm. Feodor Feodorovich Ushakov * Boris Livanov as Prince Grigori Aleksandrovich Potemkin * Sergei Bondarchuk as Tikhon Alekseevich Prokofiev * Vladimir Druzhnikov as Midshipman Vasilyev * Gennadi Yudin as Capt. Dmitri Nikolayevich Senyavin * Vladimir Vasilyev as Sultan Eski Hassan == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1953 war movies Category:Soviet war movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Romm
title: Admiral Ushakov (movie)
